Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.player

Interface Bag<T>

  • Type Parameters:
    T - is the type of element it is implemented by:
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AmmoBag, PowerUpBag, WeaponBag
    public interface Bag<T>
    this interface represent a bag of elements of type T
    See Also:
    WeaponBag, AmmoBag, PowerUpBag

    • Method Summary

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void addItem​(T item)
      adds the element to the bag
      T getItem​(T item)
      This method will delete an item from the bag
      java.util.List<T> getList()  
      java.lang.Boolean hasItem​(T item)
      checks if a given element is contained in the bag

    • Method Detail

      • getList

        java.util.List<T> getList()
        Returns:
        the list of elements contained in the bag

      • addItem

        void addItem​(T item)
        adds the element to the bag
        Parameters:
        item - is the element to add

      • getItem

        T getItem​(T item)
   throws CardNotPossessedException
        This method will delete an item from the bag
        Parameters:
        item - is the item specified
        Returns:
        the only reference to the element
        Throws:
        CardNotPossessedException - if the element is not found

      • hasItem

        java.lang.Boolean hasItem​(T item)
        checks if a given element is contained in the bag
        Parameters:
        item - is the queried element
        Returns:
        true if contained, false otherwise
